parameters.info: Set height of the resulting image.

parameters.info: Channels to select. Defaults to all.
parameters.name: chan

parameters.info: Chunk sizes to be applied to the dataset. Defaults to 100,000 in the row axis.

parameters.name: colour-axis

parameters.info: Correlation index or subset to plot. Can be specified using normal python slicing syntax. Defaults to all.

parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: TAQL where clause
parameters.name: taql
